betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Ptah is a great place! Nothing else to say! Not true, I will say more!
As every other land I have visited so far, it has bees, lots of bees! And these ones are light wizards! 
Their powers have turned a dark, mostly dead place, into a radiant world, full of beacons, which are used to produce powerful potions and foods.
While the niceness of bees everywhere is undeniable, their activities don't always reflect that. This group seems to be ready for some sort of war, or at least military action. But against who?
